Name: LU 175 - Landmarks, MHANY Multifamily Preservation Loan Program (MPLP) Accelerated UDAAP, Brooklyn (G 240064 NUK)
Title: Resolution approving an Urban Development Action Area Project pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law for property located at 1073 Utica Avenue (Block 4735, Lot 43), 996 East 46 Street (Block 5022, Lot 10), 38 Martense Street (Block 5089, Lot 20), 639 East 87 Street (Block 7992, Lot 22), Borough of Brooklyn; and waiving the urban development action area designation requirement and the Uniform Land Use Review Procedure, Community Districts 14, 17 and 18, Borough of Brooklyn (L.U. No. 175; Non-ULURP No. G 240064 NUK).
